CrL.M.C.No.7364 of 2017 Dated this the 5" day of January, 2018 ORDER When the matter was taken up and after hearing for some time, learned counsel for the petitioners sought permission to withdraw the Crl.M.C with liberty to move at the appropriate stage. 2. Permitted. Accordingly, Crl.M.C is dismissed as withdrawn. Sd/- SUNIL THOMAS Judge Sbna/5/1/18 True Copy / P A to Judge
